TextLibrary.Text: Elistara
I have come to ask for your help.
I have come to ask for your help.
I have come to ask for your help.
I have come to ask for your help.
Answer a question for me first, and I'll help in any way that I can.
Answer a question for me first, and I'll help in any way that I can.
Answer a question for me first, and I'll help in any way that I can.
Answer a question for me first, and I'll help in any way that I can.
What is your question?
What is your question?
What is your question?
What is your question?
When we first met, you introduced yourself as a Dragonknight, but I've never seen you with a Dragon. Don't all Dragonknights ride Dragons?
When we first met, you introduced yourself as a Dragonknight, but I've never seen you with a Dragon. Don't all Dragonknights ride Dragons?
When we first met, you introduced yourself as a Dragonknight, but I've never seen you with a Dragon. Don't all Dragonknights ride Dragons?
When we first met, you introduced yourself as a Dragonknight, but I've never seen you with a Dragon. Don't all Dragonknights ride Dragons?
Actually that was why I have come to ask your help. My Dragon, Crystal, was lost.
Actually that was why I have come to ask your help. My Dragon, Crystal, was lost.
Actually that was why I have come to ask your help. My Dragon, Crystal, was lost.
Actually that was why I have come to ask your help. My Dragon, Crystal, was lost.
I'm sorry to hear that.
I'm sorry to hear that.
I'm sorry to hear that.
I'm sorry to hear that.

No, you don't understand. Not killed - literally lost! We were fighting at the Battle of the Bloodstone, not long before I met you. We crashed, and when I awoke, Crystal was gone. I do not know what happened to her.

No, you don't understand. Not killed - literally lost! We were fighting at the Battle of the Bloodstone, not long before I met you. We crashed, and when I awoke, Crystal was gone. I do not know what happened to her.

No, you don't understand. Not killed - literally lost! We were fighting at the Battle of the Bloodstone, not long before I met you. We crashed, and when I awoke, Crystal was gone. I do not know what happened to her.
You want us to search for her?
You want us to search for her?
You want us to search for her?
You want us to search for her?

After we lost the Battle of the Bloodstone and then Skullguard Keep fell, we have been unable to spare any troops to search for the wounded, Elf OR Dragon. I would be forever grateful if you could take a look.

Of course. I'll let you know what I find.
